parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The instance ID.

> You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~196830~~) operation to query the information about all AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances within a region, including instance IDs.

parameters.name: ManagerAccount
parameters.description:
The name of the manager account that has the rds_superuser permission.

>  You can create an account on the Account Management page of the AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL console or by calling the [CreateAccount](~~2361789~~) operation.

parameters.name: ManagerAccountPassword
parameters.description: The password of the manager account.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description:
The name of the namespace. After the namespace is created, the system automatically creates an account that has the same name.

>  The name must comply with the naming conventions of PostgreSQL objects.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance.

parameters.name: WorkspaceId
parameters.description: The ID of the workspace that consists of multiple AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances. You must specify one of the WorkspaceId and DBInstanceId parameters. If you specify both parameters, the WorkspaceId parameter takes effect.
